me.spotlight: QA Tester with a few years in the software industry, specializing in Javascript automation testing

about.details: I am a passionate QA Tester with a strong interest in software testing. I thrive on finding bugs and ensuring top-notch quality in every software product. Currently, I am excited to delve into automation testing with WebdriverIO to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. With a solid background in manual testing and experience across various domains, I am adept at creating comprehensive test plans, executing test cases, and reporting defects. I am a proactive learner, keeping up with the latest trends in the field, and possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

hobbies: Fighting games enthusiast & Full Stack Javascript developer at nights

experiences.name: QA Tester
experiences.missionShort: Creating test cases, documentation and manual testing
missionLong: Creating test cases, documentation and manual testing
I test the software and hardware that our developers creates like websites, mobile apps and others in order to create the best technological solution for the aquaculture.
My main mission is to write test cases, make documentation for errors, automation testing and sometimes UX/UI suggestions for improvement on the hardware/software.

experiences.name: Project Manager
missionLong: I worked as a Project Manager ensuring to create a solution for Alamo Rent a Car, this solution was with the intention of create a mobile app so users can book a car and drive it without requiring to go to an Alamo Office and instead the vehicle was a safe location like a mall or hotel parking lot where users can book it, drive it and leave it in another safe spot, it was like Uber but you could drive the vehicle.

My main mission was to contact with the developers, creators of the solution and making sure that they can fulfill Alamo standards and make the required changes so the experience for users in Mexico would be perfect without any issues, I had to manually install the required hardware, test the software (for clients and administrators) and also make tickets in Jira in order to track these ones until their fulfilment.
missions: Installation of propietary hardware required for the service

experiences.name: Software Analyst (CMMI) & Web Developer Trainee
missionLong: I worked as a Software Analyst and my main task was to implement CMMI Best Practices in order to make developers on this company to understand CMMI and optimize the process of developing the propietary software, including to this I was also given the opportunity to develop some websites using wordpress as backend and the frontend being custom made.
missions: Creation of Websites powered by Wordpress

experiences.name: Data Capturer
experiences.missionShort: Inventory Management, Reporting and Creations of labels for product shipping
missionLong: Inventory Management, Reporting and Creations of labels for product shipping

I worked as a Data Capturer, making sure that everyday the inventory of our products were in the system and were real compared to our frozen stock; also I was in charge of creating labels for this products including their Name, Weight and most importantly their expiration date.
missions: Creations of labels for product shipping
